long_hair.description: Indicates whether the individual has long hair or not (1 for long hair, 0 for not long hair)

value_dict.0: The individual does not have long hair

forehead_width_cm.description: Width of the individual's forehead in centimeters

forehead_height_cm.description: Height of the individual's forehead in centimeters

nose_wide.description: Indicates whether the individual has a wide nose or not (1 for wide nose, 0 for not wide nose)

value_dict.1: The individual has a wide nose
value_dict.0: The individual does not have a wide nose

nose_long.description: Indicates whether the individual has a long nose or not (1 for long nose, 0 for not long nose)

value_dict.1: The individual has a long nose
value_dict.0: The individual does not have a long nose

lips_thin.description: Indicates whether the individual has thin lips or not (1 for thin lips, 0 for not thin lips)

value_dict.0: The individual does not have thin lips

distance_nose_to_lip_long.description: Indicates whether the distance from nose to lip is long or not (1 for long distance, 0 for not long distance)

value_dict.1: The distance from the nose to the lip of the individual is long
value_dict.0: The distance from the nose to the lip of the individual is not long

gender.description: Gender of the individual (Male or Female)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in gender recognition based on facial features.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the facial features of the individual, please predict the gender.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in recognizing hair length based on facial features.

class_value_dict.0: The individual does not have long hair

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the facial features of the individual, please predict if the individual has thin lips.
